adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
adaptability.effect: STAB moves deal 2× damage instead of 1.5×

aerilate.name: Aerilate
aerilate.description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type and power up.
aerilate.effect: Normal moves become Flying with 1.2× power boost
aerilate.competitive: Enables powerful Flying STAB on Normal moves

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.description: Damages the attacker if it causes fainting with a contact move.
aftermath.effect: Deals 25% of attacker's max HP on contact KO

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.description: Boosts move power when moving last.

arena-trap.name: Arena Trap
arena-trap.competitive: S-tier trapping ability, banned in many formats

battle-bond.name: Battle Bond
battle-bond.description: Transforms into Ash-Greninja after KOing a Pokémon.
battle-bond.effect: Greninja transforms, boosting Water Shuriken and stats

beast-boost.name: Beast Boost
beast-boost.description: Boosts highest stat by one stage after KOing a Pokémon.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when HP is low.

clear-body.name: Clear Body
clear-body.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.description: Boosts Special Attack by two stages when stats are lowered.
competitive.effect: +2 SpA when any stat is lowered by opponent

contrary.name: Contrary
contrary.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
contrary.competitive: Broken with moves like Leaf Storm, Superpower

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.description: Boosts Attack by two stages when stats are lowered.
defiant.effect: +2 Atk when any stat is lowered by opponent

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.description: First hit is blocked by the disguise.
disguise.effect: Blocks first damaging move (takes 1/8 HP recoil)

download.name: Download
download.description: Boosts Attack or Special Attack based on foe's weaker defense.
download.effect: +1 Atk or SpA depending on opponent's lower stat

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.effect: Sets Rain for 5 turns (8 with Damp Rock)

drought.name: Drought
drought.description: Summons harsh sunlight when entering battle.
drought.effect: Sets Sun for 5 turns (8 with Heat Rock)

electric-surge.name: Electric Surge
electric-surge.description: Sets Electric Terrain when entering battle.

fairy-surge.name: Misty Surge
fairy-surge.description: Sets Misty Terrain when entering battle.

flash-fire.name: Flash Fire
flash-fire.description: Absorbs Fire moves, boosting Fire-type moves.
flash-fire.effect: Immune to Fire, 1.5× Fire power after activation

guts.name: Guts
guts.description: Boosts Attack when inflicted with a status condition.
guts.effect: 1.5× Attack when statused, ignores Burn penalty
guts.competitive: Pairs with Flame Orb for power

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: Bypasses Reflect, Light Screen, and Substitute.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.effect: -1 Attack to all opponents on switch-in

iron-fist.name: Iron Fist
iron-fist.competitive: Boosts Mach Punch, Ice Punch, etc.

justified.name: Justified
justified.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.
justified.effect: +1 Attack when hit by Dark move
justified.competitive: Can be activated by ally in Doubles

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.effect: Immune to Ground moves and Spikes/Toxic Spikes

libero.name: Libero
libero.description: Changes type to match the move about to be used.
libero.effect: STAB on every move (once per switch-in)

lightning-rod.name: Lightning Rod
lightning-rod.description: Draws in Electric moves and boosts Special Attack.
lightning-rod.effect: Immune to Electric, +1 SpA when hit

magic-bounce.name: Magic Bounce
magic-bounce.description: Reflects status moves back to the attacker.
magic-bounce.effect: Reflects status moves, entry hazards, etc.

magic-guard.name: Magic Guard
magic-guard.effect: Immune to indirect damage (hazards, weather, status, recoil)

marvel-scale.name: Marvel Scale
marvel-scale.description: Boosts Defense when inflicted with a status condition.

mold-breaker.name: Mold Breaker
mold-breaker.competitive: Hits through Sturdy, Levitate, Wonder Guard

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.description: Reduces damage taken when HP is full.

natural-cure.name: Natural Cure
natural-cure.description: Heals status conditions when switching out.

no-guard.name: No Guard
no-guard.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon always land.
no-guard.competitive: Enables Stone Edge, Dynamic Punch, etc.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when HP is low.

pixilate.name: Pixilate
pixilate.description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type and power up.
pixilate.effect: Normal moves become Fairy with 1.2× power

poison-heal.name: Poison Heal
poison-heal.description: Heals HP when poisoned instead of taking damage.
poison-heal.effect: Recovers 1/8 HP per turn when poisoned

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.effect: +1 priority on status moves (fails vs Dark)

protean.name: Protean
protean.description: Changes type to match the move about to be used.
protean.effect: STAB on every move (once per switch-in)

quick-feet.name: Quick Feet
quick-feet.description: Boosts Speed when inflicted with a status condition.
quick-feet.effect: 1.5× Speed when statused, ignores paralysis speed drop

rain-dish.name: Rain Dish
rain-dish.effect: Recovers 1/16 HP per turn in Rain

sand-stream.name: Sand Stream
sand-stream.description: Summons a sandstorm when entering battle.
sand-stream.effect: Sets Sandstorm for 5 turns (8 with Smooth Rock)

serene-grace.name: Serene Grace
serene-grace.description: Doubles the chance of secondary effects.

shadow-tag.name: Shadow Tag
shadow-tag.competitive: S-tier trapping, banned in most formats

sheer-force.name: Sheer Force
sheer-force.description: Removes secondary effects for more power.
sheer-force.effect: 1.3× power, no secondary effects, no Life Orb recoil

simple.name: Simple
simple.description: Doubles the effect of stat changes.

skill-link.name: Skill Link
skill-link.description: Multi-hit moves always hit five times.

slow-start.name: Slow Start
slow-start.description: Halves Attack and Speed for five turns.

snow-warning.name: Snow Warning
snow-warning.effect: Sets Snow for 5 turns (8 with Icy Rock)

solar-power.name: Solar Power
solar-power.description: Boosts Special Attack in sunshine but takes damage.
solar-power.effect: 1.5× SpA in Sun, loses 1/8 HP per turn

speed-boost.name: Speed Boost
speed-boost.description: Boosts Speed at the end of each turn.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.description: Deals double damage to switching foes.

storm-drain.name: Storm Drain
storm-drain.description: Draws in Water moves and boosts Special Attack.
storm-drain.effect: Immune to Water, +1 SpA when hit

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: Cannot be knocked out with one hit.
sturdy.effect: Survives any hit at full HP with 1 HP

supreme-overlord.name: Supreme Overlord
supreme-overlord.description: Boosts power for each fainted ally.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.description: Passes status conditions to the attacker.

technician.name: Technician
technician.effect: 1.5× power on moves with base power ≤60

tinted-lens.name: Tinted Lens
tinted-lens.description: Powers up not very effective moves.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: Powers up Water-type moves when HP is low.

triage.name: Triage
triage.effect: +3 priority on healing moves (Draining Kiss, etc.)

truant.name: Truant
truant.description: Can only attack every other turn.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.description: Ignores stat changes of opposing Pokémon.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.description: Doubles Speed when item is lost.

volt-absorb.name: Volt Absorb
volt-absorb.description: Heals HP when hit by Electric moves.
volt-absorb.effect: Immune to Electric, heals 25% HP when hit

water-absorb.name: Water Absorb
water-absorb.description: Heals HP when hit by Water moves.
water-absorb.effect: Immune to Water, heals 25% HP when hit

weak-armor.name: Weak Armor
weak-armor.description: Physical hits lower Defense but raise Speed.

wonder-guard.name: Wonder Guard
wonder-guard.description: Only super effective moves will hit.
wonder-guard.effect: Immune to non-super effective direct damage
wonder-guard.competitive: S-tier if not for Shedinja's 1 HP

zen-mode.name: Zen Mode
zen-mode.description: Changes form when HP is halved.
